ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) bottle creamy Italian-style salad dressing

cookingTips: Cook pasta al dente then rinse with cold water to stop cooking and prevent mushiness
Drain tuna well and flake it thoroughly to distribute evenly throughout salad
Toss salad while pasta is still slightly warm so it absorbs dressing flavors better
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Why is timing important when dressing the pasta, and what consistency works best?
